title: Reliance Capital lenders urge Hinduja Group arm to stick to resolution plan deadline
description: Lenders of Reliance Capital urge IndusInd International Holdings Ltd (IIHL) to accelerate regulatory approvals for the resolution plan, emphasizing the May 27 deadline. IIHL is expected to pay Rs 9,650 crore by then. Delays in IRDAI approval for the transfer of insurance businesses raise concerns over meeting deadlines.
